content:
You're welcome! I'm thrilled to hear that you're excited to try out these techniques and incorporate found objects into your abstract expressionist pieces. It's a great way to add texture, depth, and meaning to your work, and it can be a lot of fun to experiment with different materials and techniques.

Remember, the most important thing is to have fun and enjoy the process of creating. Don't be afraid to try new things and make mistakes – they can often lead to unexpected and exciting results. And don't worry if your pieces don't turn out exactly as you envisioned them – that's all part of the creative process.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. I'm always here to help. And if you'd like to share your progress or show off your finished pieces, I'd love to see them!
